metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4048 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds read could have led to an exploitable crash when parsingHTML with DOMParser in low memory situations. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 116, Firefox ESR < 102.14, and Firefox ESR < 115.1.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
